xmodel.name: Eurace Unibi Model
xmodel.author: Simon Gemkow, Philipp Harting, Sander van der Hoog

variable.name: rnd_seed
variable.description: Random seed for the run

variable.name: total_regions
variable.description: Total number of regions.

variable.name: id_debug_probe
variable.description: ID to probe for debuging

variable.name: time_debug_probe
variable.description: Time period for debuging: print if (DAY GT time_debug_probe)

variable.name: print_log
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag for debugging output in general.

variable.name: print_debug_bankruptcy
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for bankruptcy functions.

variable.name: print_debug_eurostat
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for Eurostat.

variable.name: print_debug_ch
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for ClearingHouse.

variable.name: print_debug_afm
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for AFM (full order lists).

variable.name: print_debug_afm_ch
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info for AFM, ClearingHouse info only.

variable.name: print_debug_exp1
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal or to file.

variable.name: print_debug_file_exp1
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging info to files (requires the existence of an "its" subfolder in the folder where xml files are written).

variable.name: print_debug_file_exp2
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal or to file. Used in Government code.

variable.name: policy_exp1
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal or to file.

variable.name: print_debug_gov
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal or to file.

variable.name: print_debug_household
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal or to file.

variable.name: print_debug_credit
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal or to file.

variable.name: print_debug_consumption
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print logging output to terminal or to file.

variable.name: print_debug_finman
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug_production
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging output to terminal.

variable.name: print_debug_market_research
variable.description: 0 or 1, A flag to print debugging output to terminal.

variable.name: policy_exp_energy_shock
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: energy shock.

variable.name: policy_exp_stabilization_subsidy
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: stabilization policy using subsidy scheme.

variable.name: policy_exp_stabilization_tax
variable.description: Switch for policy experiment: stabilization policy using tax reduction scheme.

variable.name: const_bankruptcy_idle_period
variable.description: Number of iterations that a bankrupt firm remains idle, before resuming production activity.

variable.name: days_per_month
variable.description: Optional setting for the number of days in a month.

variable.name: xml_cloned
variable.description: Indicator variable: Value 1 if a cloned xml file is used

variable.name: id
variable.description: Agent ID.

variable.name: region_id
variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

variable.name: gov_id
variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

variable.name: day_of_month_to_act
variable.description: Activation day.

variable.name: last_day_of_month_to_act
variable.description: One day before the activation day.

variable.name: payment_account
variable.description: Current account value.

variable.name: payment_account_balance_sheet
variable.description: Payment account when calculating balance sheet.

variable.name: bank_id
variable.description: Bank ID at which the agent maintains its payment account.

variable.name: partition_id
variable.description: Partition ID used for parallelization.

variable.name: id
variable.description: Agent ID.

variable.name: region_id
variable.description: Region ID to which the agent is associated.

variable.name: neighboring_region_ids
variable.description: List of IDs of region that neighbour the own region.

variable.description: Government to which the agent is associated.

variable.description: Activation day.

variable.description: Current account value.

message.name: bank_account_update
message.description: Sent by agents to inform their bank about the current payment account balance.

variable.name: id
variable.description: Sending agent ID.

variable.name: bank_id
variable.description: Receiving bank agent ID.

variable.name: payment_account
variable.description: Current account value.

message.name: bank_to_central_bank_account_update
message.description: Banks send account information to central bank

variable.name: id
variable.description: Sending agent ID.

variable.name: payment_account
variable.description: Current account value.

variable.name: ecb_debt
variable.description: Debt of the bank to the Central Bank

message.name: gov_to_central_bank_account_update
message.description: Governments send account information to central bank

variable.name: id
variable.description: Sending agent ID.

variable.name: payment_account
variable.description: Current account value.
